get.summary: Get a specific assigned software record by ID

delete.summary: Delete assigned software and log the unassignment

get.summary: List teams under a specific department

get.description: Retrieves all software assignment logs with associated staff and software

post.description: Adds a new log entry for a software assignment action

get.description: Retrieves logs with optional filtering by date and search query

parameters.description: Search by staff or software name
parameters.name: search

Raw SQL version of software logs query
Retrieves all logs for a specific software ID
Retrieves all logs for a specific staff ID
Paginated and filtered logs for a given staff ID

Retrieves a single software assignment log by its ID

put.description: Updates an existing log entry by ID

delete.description: Deletes a log entry by ID

get.summary: Get paginated software with filtering and search
Get software assignment rules with software name and filters

post.summary: Create a new software assignment rule

get.summary: Get a specific software assignment rule by ID

put.summary: Update an existing software assignment rule

delete.summary: Delete a software assignment rule and revoke related assignments with logging
Force delete a software assignment rule (no unassign logging)

get.description: Retrieves all department-level software matches, optionally filtered by software_id or department_id

post.description: Creates a new department-level software match
Creates a new match and automatically assigns the software to all staff in the department

get.description: Retrieves a single software department match by ID
get.summary: Get a software department match by ID

put.description: Updates an existing software department match by ID

delete.description: Deletes a department-level software match by ID
Deletes a match and revokes software from all staff in the associated department
delete.summary: Delete match and revoke software from department staff

get.description: Retrieves all organization-level software matches, optionally filtered by software_id

post.description: Creates a new organization-level match for a software
Creates a new match and automatically assigns the software to all staff

get.description: Retrieves a single software organization match
get.summary: Get a software organization match by ID

put.description: Updates an existing software organization match by ID

delete.description: Deletes a software organization match by ID
Deletes a software organization match and automatically revokes the software from all staff
delete.summary: Delete match and revoke software from staff

get.description: Retrieves all team-level software matches, optionally filtered by software_id or team_id

post.description: Creates a match and assigns the software to all team members

get.description: Retrieves a specific software team match by its ID
get.summary: Get a software team match by ID

put.description: Updates an existing software team match by ID

delete.description: Deletes a software-team association by ID
Deletes the match and removes the software from all staff in the team
delete.summary: Delete match and revoke software from team members

get.summary: Get a software item by ID

delete.summary: Delete software and revoke all its assignments

get.summary: Get list of staff assigned to a specific software
Get staff with filters and pagination

parameters.description: Search keyword (first name, last name, or email)
parameters.name: search

get.description: Retrieve a single staff member by their unique ID
get.summary: Get a staff member by ID

delete.summary: Delete staff by ID (also revokes assigned software)

post.summary: Offboard staff (revoke all software, optionally mark as inactive)

put.summary: Update staff and sync software assignments

get.summary: Get software assigned to a specific staff by ID
Get detailed software assigned to a specific staff using Software model
List all teams with filters and department preload
